1.title: The Madness Returns
1.plot: Ranveer Singh , Rohit Shetty and Sara Ali Khan came to promote their new film titled Simbaa.

2.title: A Night To Remember
2.plot: Simmba (2018) promotion continues on The Kapil Sharma Show with Ranveer Singh, Sara Ali Khan, Rohit Shetty and Sonu Sood.

3.title: The Khan Brothers Are Here
3.plot: Actors Salman Khan, Arbaaz Khan and Sohail Khan are the special guests in this episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

4.title: The Legend
4.plot: Kapil Sharma interviews famous screenwriter Salim Khan in this Sunday's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

5.title: Yami Gautam & Vicky Kaushal
5.plot: Vicky Kaushal and Yami Gautam appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their upcoming film Uri: The Surgical Strike (2019).

6.title: The Golden Hero Shatrughan Sinha
6.plot: Actor and Politician Shatrughan Sinha and his wife Poonam Sinha are the special guests in this Sunday's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

7.title: Team Why Cheat India & Sunny Leone
7.plot: Emraan Hashmi, Guru Randhawa and Shreya Dhanwanthary promote their movie Why Cheat India (2019) while Sunny Leone promotes her song "Lovely Accident" in this Saturday's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

8.title: Nawazuddin Siddiqui & Amrita Rao
8.plot: Nawazuddin Siddiqui and Amrita Rao appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their upcoming film Thackeray (2019).

9.title: Republic Day with the Idols
9.plot: Kapil is joined by Indian Idol Season 10 finalists Salman, Nitin, Neelanjana and Ankush in the Republic Day special episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

10.title: The Father-Daughter Duo
10.plot: Anil Kapoor, Juhi Chawla, Rajkummar Rao, Sonam Kapoor and Shelly Chopra Dhar promote their movie Ek Ladki Ko Dekha Toh Aisa Laga (2019) on The Kapil Sharma Show.

11.title: The Mirza Sisters
11.plot: Tennis champion Sania Mirza and her sister Anam Mirza are the special guests in this Saturday's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

12.title: The Sister Trio
12.plot: Neeti Mohan, Mukti Mohan, Shakti Mohan and Nihar Pandya are the special guests in this Sunday's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

13.title: The Gully Boy is Here
13.plot: Ranveer Singh and Alia Bhatt promote their movie Gully Boy (2019) on The Kapil Sharma Show.

14.title: When Dance Meets Comedy
14.plot: Shilpa Shetty Kundra, Geeta Kapoor, and Anurag Basu, who are the judges of dance reality show "Super Dancer" are the special guests in this Sunday's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

15.title: Total Dhamaal
15.plot: Madhuri Dixit, Anil Kapoor, Ajay Devgn, Riteish Deshmukh and Indra Kumar promote their movie Total Dhamaal (2019) on The Kapil Sharma Show.

16.title: The Dhamaal Continues
16.plot: The promotion of Total Dhamaal (2019) continues on The Kapil Sharma Show.

17.title: Episode #2.17
17.plot:

1.title: FAN Special with Shah Rukh Khan
1.plot: Kapil Sharma, Sumona Chakravarty, Sunil Grover, Ali Asgar, Chandan Prabhakar and Kiku Sharda perform live in New Delhi as they begin a new journey with The Kapil Sharma Show.

2.title: Tiger Shroff and Shraddha Kapoor - Baaghi
2.plot: Bollywood actors Tiger Shroff and Shraddha Kapoor appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their upcoming film Baaghi (2016).

3.title: Yo Yo Ka Halla in Kapil's Mohalla
3.plot: Kapil Sharma talks about the problems faced by people due to shortage of water while popular singer from Punjab Yo Yo Honey Singh arrives on the show for the promotion of his film Zorawar (2016).

4.title: Wasim Akram ka Jalwa
4.plot: Former captain of Pakistan cricket team Wasim Akram and his wife Shaniera Thompson are the special guests in this Sunday's edition of The Kapil Sharma Show.

5.title: Emraan Hashmi, Prachi Desai, Lara Dutta and Mohammad Azharuddin - Azhar
5.plot: Former captain of Indian cricket team Mohammad Azharuddin appears on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of his biopic Azhar (2016) accompanied by actors Emraan Hashmi, Prachi Desai and Lara Dutta.

6.title: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Randeep Hooda in Sarabjit
6.plot: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Randeep Hooda along with the director Omung Kumar comes to Kapil for the promotion of the Film Sarabjit 2016 which is a Biopic of Sarabjit Singh.

7.title: Saina Nehwal Ka Smash
7.plot: Kapil is playing cricket today with fellow characters to get selected in the IPL. Saina Nehwal tells some part of the journey, how she became Indian badminton player and world no.1 in Women's Singles.

8.title: Housefull of Masti
8.plot: Akshay Kumar, Abhishek Bachchan and Ritesh Deshmukh comes to visit Kapil Sharma for whole of 1 hour to promote their new film called Housefull 3.

9.title: Housefull of Masti Continues
9.plot: Kapil and Chandu dress up as Father and Mother and goes to Dr. Mashoor Gulati to ask his daughter for marriage. After the act Chunky Pandey and Jackie Shroff join Akshay Kumar, Abhishek Bachchan and Ritesh Deshmukh and the Masti continues.

10.title: Ravishing Raveena & 'DJ' Bravo
10.plot: Kapil dress up as a Doctor and along with Dr. Mashoor Gulati tries to fool a bank inspector to loan money. Later Raveen Tondon an Bollywood actress and Dwayne Bravo a West Indies Cricketer comes to Indian T.V Show for the first time.

11.title: Gayle Storms While Kanika Sings
11.plot: Big Six Hitter Chris Gayle from West Indies comes to the Show later followed by Bollywood Singers Kankia Kapoor and Mikha Singh. Chris Gayle at the end promotes his book called "Six Machine"

12.title: Team CID in Kapil's Mohalla
12.plot: Cast of CID a Indian television series comes to Kapil's show, Cast includes Dayanand Shetty, Aditya Srivastava and Shivaji Satam known for their role Inspector Daya, Inspector Abhijeet and A.C.P. Pradyuman.

13.title: Mohalle Mein Shaadi
13.plot: Bollywood's newly wed Bipasha Basu and Karan Singh Grover comes to the show.

14.title: Sania Mirza & Farah Khan
14.plot: Navjot Singh Sidhu escorts Sania Mirza Indian Women's Tennis Player to the show later followed by Farah Khan a Bollywood Choreography.

15.title: Do Lafzon Ki Kahani with Kapil
15.plot: Chandu's Wife has arrived and is very angry, she gets in argument with everybody else. After, Amaal Malik, Armaan Malik, Kajal Aggarwal and Randeep Hooda comes to the show to promote their upcoming Romantic film Do Lafzon Ki Kahani.

16.title: Team Sairat in Kapil's Mohalla
16.plot: Kapil and cast dresses up as school kids in order to con school grant inspector to get a grant of Rupees 25 Lakhs. Later Rinku Rajguru and Akash Thosar actors known Marathi Film "Sairat" appears to the show along with some of their cast.

17.title: Shilpa, Shamita in Kapil's Mohalla
17.plot: Indian actress Shilpa Shetty Kundra appears on The Kapil Sharma Show along with her younger sister Shamita Shetty who also happens to be an actress. Later on they are joined in by Shilpa Shetty's husband Raj Kundra.

18.title: Special Guest Rahat Fateh Ali Khan
18.plot: Famous Pakistani musician Rahat Fateh Ali Khan appears as a special guest in this Sunday's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

19.title: Star Cast of Raman Raghav 2.0
19.plot: Director Anurag Kashyap appears on The Kapil Sharma Show along with actors Nawazuddin Siddiqui and Vicky Kaushal for the promotion of their film Raman Raghav 2.0 (2016).

20.title: Rocking Govinda in Kapil's Mohalla
20.plot: Its Khajoor's Birthday, Chandu have invited Govinda to the show. Later followed by his wife and daughter Sunita and Tina Ahuja.

21.title: Navjot Kaur Sidhu in Kapil's Mohalla
21.plot: Kapil, Chandu and Dr. Mashoor Gulati opens their own sari shops and try to influence a couple to buy from their shop. Later Mrs Navjot Kaur Sidhu appears first time on a Indian T.V Show.

22.title: Wadali Bandu Night
22.plot: Shri Puran Chand Wadali, Pyarelal Wadali and Lakhwinder Wadali who are Sufi singers and musicians from Guru Ki Wadali in the Amritsar District in Punjab comes to the show.

23.title: Sultan In Kapil's Mohalla
23.plot: Salman Khan and Anushka Sharma comes to The Kapil's Show to promote their film Sultan.

24.title: Madaari Ka Khel in Kapil's Mohalla
24.plot: Irrfan Khan and Jimmy Shergill comes to promote their upcoming film 'Madaari'.

25.title: Great Grand Masti with Kapil Sharma
25.plot: Vivek Oberoi, Aftab Shivdasani and Riteish Deshmukh comes to the show to promote their upcoming film "Great Grand Masti". Later Urvashi Rautela who is the lead actress of the and Indra Kumar, director of the film joins them.

26.title: Music Maestro A.R Rahman
26.plot: Allah-Rakha Rahman aka A. R. Rahman, is an Indian composer, singer-songwriter, music producer, musician and philanthropist comes to the show.

27.title: Dishoom in Kapil's Mohalla
27.plot: John Abraham, Varun Dhawan and Jacqueline Fernandez comes to the Kapil's show to promote their upcoming film "Dishoom"

28.title: Star Cast of Happy Bhag Jayegi
28.plot: Actors Abhay Deol, Diana Penty, Momal Sheikh and Ali Fazal appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their upcoming film Happy Bhag Jayegi (2016).

29.title: Arshad Warsi in Kapil's Mohalla
29.plot: Along with his wife Maria Goretti Warsi, Arshad Warsi comes to the show to promote his upcoming Indian comedy film "The Legend of Michael Mishra". On the other hand Maria Goretti Warsi promotes her book "From My Kitchen To Yours".

30.title: Team Fever on the Kapil Sharma Show
30.plot: Kapil opens a Bank for his comedy act. Later Gauhar Khan and Rajeev Khandelwal comes to the show to promote their upcoming movie "Fever" which is an Indian suspense thriller flick.

31.title: Manoj Bajpayee in Kapil's Mohalla
31.plot: Kapil Sharma opens his act with inaugural of Bullet Train. Later Manoj Bajpai along with kid actor Mayur Patole comes to the show for promotion of upcoming Indian film " Budhia Singh - Born to Run"

32.title: Team Mohenjo Daro in Kapil's Show
32.plot: Hrithik Roshan comes to the show to promote his upcoming Indian epic adventure-romance film "Mohenjo Daro" Later Ashutosh Gowariker and Pooja Hegde joins them.

33.title: Rustom in Kapil's Mohalla
33.plot: Akshay Kumar takes four different entries later he, Ileana and Esha Gupta promote their upcoming film "Rustom".

34.title: Rustom's Courtroom Drama
34.plot: Chandu has a new rival when Chappu opens up a Coffee shop. Later a comedy version reenactment of courtroom is presented with Akshay Kumar, Ileana D'Cruz, Esha Gupta, Arjan Bajwa and some cast of Kapil's show.

35.title: A Flying Jatt in Kapil's Show
35.plot: Tiger Shroff and Jacqueline Fernandez comes to the show to promote their upcoming Indian Super Hero flick " A Flying Jatt in Kapil's Show"

36.title: Brett Lee in Kapil's Mohalla
36.plot: Former Australian cricketer Brett Lee and Indian actress Tannishtha Chatterjee appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their upcoming film UNindian (2015).

37.title: Ghazal Kings in Kapil's Mohalla
37.plot: Chappu opens up a Gym. Later Anup Jalota, Talat Aziz and Pankaj Udhas who all are Indian ghazal singers, comes to the show.

38.title: Akira in Kapil's Mohalla
38.plot: Sonakshi Sinha comes to the show to promote her upcoming Indian film "Akira" in which a college girl has grown up with the principal of being self reliant.

39.title: Masti with Super Dancer Judges
39.plot: Shilpa Shetty, Geeta Kapoor and Anurag Basu, judges from reality TV show "Super Dancer" comes to the show.

40.title: Katrina Aur Sidharth Ka Jalwa
40.plot: Katrina Kaif and Sidharth Malhotra comes to the show to promote their upcoming flick "Baar Baar Dekho".

41.title: Freaky Ali Team in Kapil Show
41.plot: Arbaaz Khan, Sohail Khan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui and Amy Jackson comes to the Kapil's Show to promote their upcoming film "Freaky Ali" later on Jas Arora joins them.

42.title: Arijit Singh in Kapil's Show
42.plot: Arijit Singh an Indian playback singer and a music programmer comes to Kapil's Show.

43.title: Shekhar & Vamps in Kapil Show
43.plot: Music composer Shekhar Ravjiani appears on The Kapil Sharma Show along with members of the British Pop Band The Vamps.

44.title: Team Banjo in Kapil's Show
44.plot: Riteish Deshmukh, Nargis Fakhri and Dharmesh Yelande come to the show to promote their upcoming film "Banjo" which is an Indian musical action drama film.

45.title: Yuvraj & Hazel in Kapil's Show
45.plot: Yuvraj Singh along with his fiance Hazel Keech comes to the show to promote his Cancer Charity Foundation known as YouWeCan.

46.title: Team Tutak Tutak Tutiya in Kapil's Show
46.plot: Prabhudheva, Sonu Sood and Tamannaah Bhatia comes to the Kapil's Show to promote their upcoming film Devi (titled Abhinetri in Telugu and Tutak Tutak Tutiya in Hindi).

47.title: Sonakshi and John in Kapil's Show
47.plot: Sonakshi Sinha and John Abraham comes to the Kapil's Show to promote their upcoming thriller film "Force 2"

48.title: Anna Hazare in Kapil's Show
48.plot: Kisan Baburao "Anna" Hazare comes to Kapil's Show to promote his biographical film called "Anna"

49.title: Team Mirzya in Kapil's Show
49.plot: Anil Kapoor and his son Harshvardhan Kapoor along with others come to the Kapil's Show to promote their upcoming film "Mirzya".

50.title: Shankar, Ehsaan & Loy in Kapil's Show
50.plot: Jennifer Winget, Kushal Tandon and Aneri Vajani makes a special appearance to promote their upcoming Indian TV Show "Beyhadh". Later Indian musician Ehsaan Noorani, Shankar Mahadevan and Loy Mendonsa comes to the show.

51.title: Team Saat Uchakkey in Kapil's Show
51.plot: Soha Ali Khan and Neha Dhupia comes to promote "Moh Maya Money" and "No Filter". Later Manoj Bajpayee, Kay Kay Menon and Vijay Raaz comes to promote "Saat Uchakkey".

52.title: Champions of Paralympics in Kapil's Show
52.plot: Winners and participants of Paralympic Games come to the Kapil's Show.

53.title: Team Ae Dil Hai Mushkil in Kapil's Show
53.plot: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Ranbir Kapoor and Anushka Sharma come to Kapil's show to promote their upcoming film "Ae Dil Hai Mushkil"

54.title: Anushka & Ranbir Kapoor in Kapil's Show
54.plot: Kapil Sharma interacts with Ranbir Kapoor and Anushka Sharma as they visit The Kapil Sharma Show to promote their film Ae Dil Hai Mushkil.

55.title: Ajay Devgan and Kajol Rock Kapil's Show
55.plot: Ajay Devgan and Kajol visit Kapil Sharma's Show to promote their film Shivaay.

56.title: Team Shivaay in Kapil's Show
56.plot: Promotion of Shivaay continues as actresses Erika Kaar, Abigail Eames and Sayesha Saigal join Kapil Sharma in this Sunday's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

57.title: Team Rock on 2 in Kapil's Show
57.plot: Farhan Akhtar, Shraddha Kapoor, Arjun Rampal and Prachi Desai visit Kapil's house to promote their film Rock On 2.

58.title: Punjabi Singers in Kapil's Show
58.plot: Kapil Sharma's house is visited by Nooran Sisters, Sukhwinder Singh and Rabbi Shergill.

59.title: Vidya and Arjun in Kapil's Show
59.plot: Vidya Balan and Arjun Rampal visit The Kapil Sharma Show to promote their film Kahaani 2.

60.title: Sony Celebrates 21st Anniversary
60.plot: Sony Entertainment Television celebrates it's 21st Anniversary on The Kapil Sharma Show.

61.title: Kabaddi Champions in Kapil's Show
61.plot: Players of Indian Kabaddi Team visit The Kapil Sharma Show after winning the World Cup.

62.title: Shahrukh and Alia in Kapil's Show
62.plot: Shahrukh Khan and Alia Bhatt visit Kapil's Show to promote their film Dear Zindagi.

63.title: Ranveer and Vaani in Kapil's Show
63.plot: Ranveer Singh and Vaani Kapoor visit The Kapil Sharma Show to promote their film Befikre.

64.title: Karan Johar in Kapil's Show
64.plot: Karan Johar appears on The Kapil Sharma Show as a special guest.

65.title: Daler Mehndi and Mika in Kapil's Show
65.plot: Daler Mehndi and Mika Singh visit Kapil's show to promote their upcoming music album Sohniye.

66.title: Virender Sehwag in Kapil's Show
66.plot: Cricketer Virender Sehwag joins Kapil Sharma in this week's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

67.title: Sunny Deol & Bobby Deol in Kapil's Show
67.plot: Sunny Deol, Bobby Deol and Shreyas Talpade visit Kapil's Mohalla for the promotion of their film Poster Boyz.

68.title: Indian Idol Team in Kapil's Show
68.plot: Anu Malik, Sonu Nigam and Farah Khan appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of Indian Idol, where all three of them are judges.

69.title: Christmas Special with Sunny Leone
69.plot: Finalists of Super Dancer Ditya, Yogesh and Dipali join Kapil in the Christmas special episode of The Kapil Sharma Show. Later on actress Sunny Leone accompanied by her husband Daniel Weber becomes a part of the celebrations as well.

70.title: New Year Special
70.plot: Famous news anchor Shweta Singh, music composers Meet Bros, Super Dancer finalist Masoom and her Super-guru Palden join Kapil and his team in the New Year special episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

71.title: Priyanka Chopra in Kapil's Show
71.plot: Actress Priyanka Chopra appears on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of her upcoming Punjabi film Sarvann (2017). Later on actors Simi Chahal and Ranjit Bawa who are the lead actors of the film also join in the show.

72.title: Aditya and Shraddha Kapoor in Kapil's Show
72.plot: Actors Aditya Roy Kapoor and Shraddha Kapoor appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their upcoming film OK Jaanu.

73.title: Himesh and Lulia in Kapil's Show
73.plot: Music composer Himesh Reshammiya and actress Lulia Vântur appear on The Kapil Sharma Show to celebrate the success of their new album 'Aap Se Mausiiquii'.

74.title: Phogat Sisters in Kapil's Show
74.plot: Former Wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his daughters Geeta Phogat and Babita Phogat are the special guests in this week's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

75.title: Shahrukh & Nawazuddin in Kapil's Show
75.plot: Actors Shahrukh Khan and Nawazuddin Siddiqui appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their upcoming film Raees.

76.title: Baba Ramdev in Kapil's Show
76.plot: Yog Guru Baba Ramdev joins Kapil in this week's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

77.title: Richa Sharma in Kapil Sharma Show
77.plot: Famous Punjabi Singer Richa Sharma joins Kapil in this week's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

78.title: Jackie Chan in Kapil's Show
78.plot: Chinese actor Jackie Chan appears on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of his upcoming Indo-Chinese film Kung Fu Yoga.

79.title: Team Kaabil in Kapil's Show
79.plot: Actor Hrithik Roshan appears on The Kapil Sharma Show accompanied by Rakesh Roshan, Yami Gautam, Ronit Roy, Rohit Roy, Urvashi Rautela and Sanjay Gupta for the promotion of his film Kaabil.

80.title: Jolly LLB in Kapil's Show
80.plot: Actors Akshay Kumar and Huma Qureshi appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their film Jolly LLB 2.

81.title: Rishi Kapoor & Neetu Singh in Kapil's House
81.plot: Actor Rishi Kapoor appears on The Kapil Sharma Show accompanied by his wife Neetu Singh for the promotion of his autobiography Khullam Khulla.

82.title: Gurdas Maan in Kapil's Show
82.plot: Popular Punjabi singer Gurdas Maan appears on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of his upcoming music album Punjab.

83.title: Shahid and Kangana in Kapil's Show
83.plot: Actors Shahid Kapoor and Kangana Ranaut appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their upcoming film Rangoon.

84.title: Govinda & Shakti Kapoor in Kapil's Show
84.plot: Actor Govinda appears on The Kapil Sharma Show accompanied by his wife Sunita Ahuja and Shakti Kapoor for the promotion of his upcoming film Aa Gaya Hero.

85.title: Vishal Bharadwaj & Rekha Bharadwaj in Kapil's Show
85.plot: Filmmaker Vishal Bharadwaj and his wife Rekha Bharadwaj join Kapil Sharma in this week's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

86.title: Varun and Alia in Kapil's Show
86.plot: Actors Varun Dhawan and Alia Bhatt appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their upcoming film Badrinath Ki Dulhania.

87.title: Blind T20 World Champions in Kapil's Show
87.plot: T20 Blind Cricket World Cup Champions join Kapil Sharma in this special episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

88.title: Abbas Mustan in Kapil's Show
88.plot: Famous director-duo Abbas-Mustan visit Kapil's society for the promotion of their new film Machine. The lead pair of the film Mustafa Burmawala and Kiara Advani also grace the show with their presence.

89.title: Remo, Terence & Vaibhavi in Kapil's Show
89.plot: Choreographers Remo D'Souza, Terence Lewis and Vaibhavi Merchant join Kapil in this week's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

90.title: Anushka Sharma in Kapil's Show
90.plot: Actress Anushka Sharma appears on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of her upcoming film Phillauri.

91.title: Team Begum Jaan in Kapil's Show
91.plot: Vidya Balan appears on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of her upcoming film Begum Jaan accompanied by the entire cast of the film.

92.title: Manoj and Taapsee in Kapil's Show
92.plot: Actors Manoj Bajpayee and Tapsee Pannu appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their upcoming film Naam Shabana (2017).

93.title: Stand Up Comedians in Kapil's Show
93.plot: Popular stand-up comedians Raju Srivastav, Sunil Pal and Ehsan Quraishi join Kapil in this week's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

94.title: Raveena Tandon in Kapil's Show
94.plot: Actress Raveena Tandon appears on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of her new kids reality show called Sabse Bada Kalakar and her upcoming film Maatr.

95.title: Parineeti Chopra & Ayushmann in Kapil's Show
95.plot: Parineeti Chopra and Ayushmann Khurana appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their upcoming film Meri Pyaari Bindu.

96.title: Bappi Lahiri in Kapil's Show
96.plot: Music composer Bappi Lahiri and the top 5 finalists of Indian Idol join Kapil Sharma in this week's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

97.title: Sonakshi & Shibani in Kapil's Show
97.plot: Kapil is joined by actresses Sonakshi Sinha and Shibani Dandekar in this week's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

98.title: Shaan in Kapil's Show
98.plot: Famous playback singer Shaan and his wife Radhika join Kapil in this week's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

99.title: Hans Raj Hans in Kapil's Show
99.plot: Famous Punjabi singer Hans Raj Hans and his son Navraj Hans join Kapil in this week's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

100.title: 100 Not Out
100.plot: Members of the Indian women's cricket team - Mithali Raj, Harmanpreet Kaur, Veda Krishnamurthy and Jhulan Goswami join Kapil and his team as they celebrate the completion of 100 episodes of The Kapil Sharma Show.

101.title: Salim Sulaiman in Kapil's Show
101.plot: Music composer duo Salim-Sulaiman and singer Benny Dayal join Kapil Sharma in this Saturday's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

102.title: Villains' Special
102.plot: Iconic villains of the Indian Film Industry, Prem Chopra, Raza Murad and Ranjeet join Kapil.

103.title: Sunidhi & Hitesh in Kapil's Show
103.plot: Popular singer Sunidhi Chauhan and music composer Hitesh Sonik are the special guests in this Saturday's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

104.title: Irrfan Khan in Kapil's Show
104.plot: Actors Irrfan Khan and Deepak Dobriyal appear on The Kapil Sharma Show along with music composer duo Sachin-Jigar for the promotion of their upcoming film Hindi Medium (2017).

105.title: Asha Parekh and Helen in Kapil's Show
105.plot: Evergreen actresses of the Indian Film Industry, Asha Parekh and Helen appear as special guests on this Saturday's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

106.title: Arjun and Shraddha in Kapil's Show
106.plot: Actors Arjun Kapoor and Shraddha Kapoor appear on The Kapil Sharma Show along with novelist Chetan Bhagat for the promotion of their upcoming film Half Girlfriend (2017).

107.title: Manisha Koirala in Kapil's Show
107.plot: Actress Manisha Koirala appears on The Kapil Sharma Show along with her co-star Shreya Chaudhary for the promotion of their upcoming film Dear Maya (2017).

108.title: Huma Qureshi in Kapil's Show
108.plot: Actors Huma Qureshi and Saqib Saleem appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their upcoming film Dobaara: See Your Evil (2017).

109.title: Raina, Shikhar & Hardik in Kapil's Show
109.plot: Indian cricketers Suresh Raina, Shikhar Dhawan and Hardik Pandya are the special guests in this Saturday's edition of The Kapil Sharma Show.

110.title: Team Friendship Unlimited in Kapil's Show
110.plot: The entire star cast of upcoming Marathi film FU: Friendship Unlimited (2017) appears in this Sunday's edition of The Kapil Sharma Show.

111.title: Team Behen Hogi Teri in Kapil's Show
111.plot: Actors Rajkummar Rao, Shruti Haasan, Gulshan Grover and Gautam Gulati appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their film Behen Hogi Teri (2017).

112.title: Sushant and Kriti in Kapil's Show
112.plot: Actors Sushant Singh Rajput and Kriti Sanon appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their film Raabta (2017).

113.title: Vivek and Riteish in Kapil's Show
113.plot: Actors Riteish Deshmukh and Vivek Oberoi appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their upcoming film Bank Chor (2017).

114.title: Diljit and Sonam in Kapil's Show
114.plot: Punjabi actors Diljit Dosanjh and Sonam Bajwa appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their upcoming film Super Singh (2017).

115.title: Night of the Champions
115.plot: Wrestler Sushil Kumar, footballer Bhaichung Bhutia. long jumper Anju Bobby George and mountaineer Love Raj Singh Dharmshaktu are special guests in this Saturday's edition of The Kapil Sharma Show.

116.title: Paresh Rawal, Tanvi Azmi, Kartik Aaryan & Kirti Kharbanda in Kapil's Show
116.plot: Actors Paresh Rawal, Tanvi Azmi, Kartik Aaryan and Kriti Kharbanda appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their upcoming movie which goes by the name of Guest in London.

117.title: An Evening of Poetry
117.plot: Renowned Indian poets Dr. Kumar Vishwas, Rahat Indori and Shabeena Adeeb are the special guests in this Saturday's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

118.title: Pathan Brothers in Kapil's Show
118.plot: Indian cricketers Irfan Pathan, Yusuf Pathan and their father Mehmood Khan Pathan are the special guests in this Sunday's edition of The Kapil Sharma Show.

119.title: Fun with Indian Hockey Team
119.plot: Members of the Indian National Hockey Team Sardara Singh, Manpreet Singh, Ramandeep Singh, Akashdeep Singh, Harmanpreet Singh and their coach Jugraj Singh are the special guests in this Saturday's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

120.title: Indu Sarkar Cast in Kapil's Show
120.plot: Actors Neil Nitin Mukesh, Kirti Kulhari, music composer Bappi Lahiri and Film Director Madhur Bhandarkar appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their upcoming movie Indu Sarkar (2017).

121.title: Prakash Jha and Ekta Kapoor in Kapil's Show
121.plot: Filmmakers Prakash Jha and Ekta Kapoor appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their upcoming film Lipstick Under My Burkha (2016).

122.title: Fun with Team Munna Michael
122.plot: Actors Tiger Shroff and Nidhhi Agerwal appear on The Kapil Sharma Show along with Film Director Sabir Khan for the promotion of their film Munna Michael (2017).

123.title: Mubarakan Special - Part 1
123.plot: Film actors Anil Kapoor, Arjun Kapoor and Ileana D'Cruz appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their film Mubarakan (2017).

124.title: Mubarakan Special - Part 2
124.plot: Kapil Sharma is joined by actors Pavan Malhotra, Rahul Dev, Karan Kundrra and Film Director Anees Bazmee as promotion of Mubarakan (2017) continues on The Kapil Sharma Show.

125.title: Babumoshai Bandookbaaz
125.plot: Actors Nawazuddin Siddiqui and Bidita Bag appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their upcoming film Babumoshai Bandookbaaz (2017).

126.title: Hariharan & Leslie Lewis
126.plot: Music composers Hariharan and Leslie Lewis are the special guests in this Sunday's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show.

127.title: Bareilly Ki Barfi Special - Part 1
127.plot: Film actors Ayushmann Khurrana, Kriti Sanon and Rajkummar Rao appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their upcoming film Bareilly Ki Barfi (2017).

128.title: Bareilly Ki Barfi Special - Part 2
128.plot: Actors Pankaj Tripathi, Seema Bhargava and Film Director Ashwiny Iyer Tiwari join Ayushmaan, Kriti and Rajkummar as promotion of Bareilly Ki Barfi (2017) continues on The Kapil Sharma Show.

129.title: A Gentleman in Kapil's Show
129.plot: Featuring film actors Sidharth Malhotra and Jacqueline Fernandez for the promotion of their upcoming film A Gentleman (2017).

130.title: Fun with the Cast of Daddy
130.plot: Film actors Arjun Rampal and Aishwarya Rajesh appear on The Kapil Sharma Show for the promotion of their upcoming film Daddy (2017).

locations: Film City, Goregaon East, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India
imdb.title: The Kapil Sharma Show
plot: Comedian Kapil Sharma interacts with celebrity guests about their latest films while keeping the audience laughing with his wit, humour and assorted skits.::Google
